• Product Description
  • Style Note

  • The fetish for lace is here to stay. It is in accordance with this trend that Neels introduces this evening dress that's cut from intricate lace for Spring-Summer. This particular piece in black is best styled with pumps and gold toned jewellery for an evening rendezvous.

  • Product Details

  • Black laced dress
